mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_TYPE, A.BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE, WRITER , BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_CONTENT, A.LECTURE_CODE, ATTEND_NO FROM BOARD A WHERE A.LECTURE_CODE = #{lecture_code} ORDER BY DECODE(A.BOARD_TYPE, '강좌공지', 1, A.BOARD_NO, 2), A.BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT USER_ID FROM LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_CODE = #{lecture_code}
SELECT USER_ID FROM ATTEND WHERE ATTEND_NO = #{attend_no}
